#summary Terminal program used to develop and debug PropForth

http://ttssh2.sourceforge.jp/

Versions of teraterm used in testing:
4.67
4.65
4.63

Install using all defaults

Change the following parameters: 
Setup - > Terminal -> New-Line receive CR+LF (PropForth 3.6 and later should use default CR)
Setup - > Terminal -> New-Line Transmit CR 
Setup - > Terminal -> Terminal ID VT100
Setup - > Terminal -> Local Echo UNCHECKED
Setup - > Terminal -> Auto Switch Checked 
Setup - > Terminal -> Answerback - blank
